metadata.title: CVE-2019-14492 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenCV before 3.4.7 and 4.x before 4.1.1. There is an out of bounds read/write in the function HaarEvaluator::OptFeature::calc in modules/objdetect/src/cascadedetect.hpp, which leads to denial of service. It was discovered that OpenCV incorrectly handled certain files. An attaacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: opencv package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.2+dfsg-4ubuntu3').
